title: Cannot run League Of Legends
body: Everytime I try to startup League, it starts out normally with the League Of Legends symbol. But after a couple of seconds it just shuts down. Does someone have a solution for this?

replies.body: Hey, did you get a solution for this? I've been working with support for 8 days now and still no love. Would be great to hear if you got it working.

It seems like the program itself is having problems opening up and launching.  Essentially, you are telling the program to run, but something on your computer is telling it "nope, not happening".

To get your computer and League happy and working together, make sure to complete the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).  There are a lot of steps there, but it should get your patcher opening up and running smoothly.

Let me know if it still won't open!
Hi. I'm having the same problem on my Macbook Pro. I've been through all the patching issues suggestions and still no love. Any other ideas?

If none of those steps seem to have helped, make sure that you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this issue resolved.

Anyone found a solution to this yet? 

Got a ticket response to generic troubleshooting again. Still no love. 

The launcher simply won't load. I have exactly the same issue on my wife's laptop....
